org.jogger.middleware.router.loader
Interface RoutesLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileRoutesLoader, FileSystemRoutesLoader
public interface RoutesLoader

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary
 List<Route> load()
           
 

Method Detail

load

List<Route> load()
                 throws ParseException,
                        RoutesException
Returns:
a List of Route objects or an empty List if there are no routes.
Throws:
ParseException - if there is a problem parsing the file.
RoutesException - if the file is not found or any other problem creating the routes.
